short_summary: Avaya training for Shared Services Canada
description: The Digital Services Branch at Shared Services Canada Learning and Development team requires a Contractor to deliver a series of Avaya training. Estimated quantity of commodity: 394 participants. Estimated Duration of contract: 2023-04-01 to 2026-03-31. Estimated Time frame of delivery: 2023-04-01 to 2026-03-31.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Avaya Training
## Official Title: Request for Information (RFI) – Avaya Training Services

### Contract Details

* Contract Reference: PW-22-01010950
* Solicitation Reference: R000123530
* Publication Date: October 21, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 2, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* Tender Status: Expired

### Goods and Services

* Global Supply Category (GSC): Seminars * EDP Training * Educational Services - ADP Training
* UNSPSC (United Nations Standard Products and Services Code): Not Applicable
* Procurement Category: Services (SRV)
* Trade Agreements: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Details

* Estimate Quantity (Contractors): 394 participants
* Estimated Duration of Contract: April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2026
* Estimated Time Frame of Delivery: April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2026

### Contracting Authority

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

### Contact Information

* Primary Contact:
  * Name: Krys Pikula
  * Email: [krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
  * Phone: 613-668-2207
* Secondary Contact:
  * Email: [krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
  * Phone: 613-668-2207
  * Fax: Not Applicable
